description: This is a test source file for the Attendance model in the kindergarten management system project. It contains unit tests for creating, mapping, and validating Attendance instances.

classes.name: Attendance
classes.description: Model class representing attendance records, with properties like id, studentId, date, status, checkInTime, checkOutTime, notes, recordedBy, and methods for mapping and copying.

classes.name: AttendanceStatus
classes.description: Enum representing different attendance statuses such as present, absent, late, and excused.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function executing a group of unit tests for the Attendance model, covering creation, mapping, status display, copying, and edge cases.
